turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule a check-up appointment with Dr. Ramirez. How can I do that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help you with that. To schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, please provide your full name and date of birth.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's John Smith, and my birthday is May 15, 1980. But honestly, this is the third time I've had to schedule this appointment. Is there a way to just automatically book it next year?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Mr. Smith. I'm sorry for the repeated scheduling issues. While we don't have an automated yearly booking system, I can definitely help get you set up for next year. Let me find an available appointment for you.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, thanks. Any time in the next two weeks would work. What days/times are available?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Let me check Dr. Ramirez's schedule... Okay, we have availability on Tuesday at 2:00 PM or Thursday at 10:00 AM. Which works best for you?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, neither of those are ideal, but I guess Thursday at 10:00 AM is okay. Can you confirm that's Thursday, October 26th?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, Mr. Smith, that's correct. Thursday, October 26th at 10:00 AM. The appointment is confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: No, that's all, thank you. And thanks for dealing with my frustration!
